## Usage

Start server:

```bash
PARAMETER_TAR_PATH=/data/param.tar TOPOLOGY_FILE_PATH=/data/inference_topology.pkl python main.py
```

In another terminal:

```bash
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST -d
